item.title: What's Next: How Top MLB Signings and Trades Affect New Teams, Free Agency
item.description: When a key player moves on, there's always a big questions about what's next for the teams involved. We're breaking down all of MLB's big deals.

item.description: The Eagles and Commanders meet in an NFC East battle on FOX. Follow along for the highlights and top plays!

item.description: As Michael King returns to San Diego, where do Padres go from here?

item.title: UConn's Azzi Fudd splashes 3-pointer, extending lead over Iowa
item.description: Azzi Fudd splashed a 3-pointer that extended the UConn Huskies' lead to 76-48 over the Iowa Hawkeyes.

item.title: Michigan Head Coach Search Rumors: Kenny Dillingham 'Never Got Offered' the Job
item.description: Who will be Michigan's next head coach? Here are the latest rumors surrounding the vacancy.
